managers

Class ApplicationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.ApplicationManager

  • public class ApplicationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The application manager class interacts with the entities job and application and allows the addition and withdrawal of job applications in the system.
    Author:
    Mathias Wiesbauer

        jobID - the job ID
        Returns:
        returns a Application instance or NULL

        Returns:
        returns an ArrayList of Application instances

      • getPendingApplications

        public java.util.ArrayList<Application> getPendingApplications(java.lang.String jobID)
        Searches and returns a list of pending job applications for a particula job from the system
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID in the system
        Returns:
        returns an ArrayList of Application instances

      • submitApplication

        public void submitApplication(java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String jobID,
                              java.lang.String coverLetter,
                              java.lang.String resume)
        Adds an application to the system if the application does not yet exist
        Parameters:
        email - the email address of the applicant
        jobID - the job ID the application will be associated with
        coverLetter - the applicants cover letter
        resume - the applicants resume

      • printDashboard

        public void printDashboard(java.lang.String email)
        Prints the dashboard for a particular user showing the jobs and their status
        Parameters:
        email - the email address of the user

      • printApplication

        public void printApplication(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String jobID)
        Will be used to print an application if it exists in the system or otherwise print an error message
        Parameters:
        email - is the email address of the applicant
        jobID - is the jobID of the job opening

      • viewPendingJobApplications

        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job in the system
